document_data.name: ''Whispering Promise''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Whispering Promise''''' was a unique ring that blessed its wearer with a [[magic]]al boon.
document_data.Description: The ring emanated a comforting voice that continuously chanted a prayer while it was worn.
document_data.Powers: Whenever the wearer of the ''Whispering Promise'' healed another being, their inherent defenses and combat prowess were enhanced for short time.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, it was in the possession of the [[goblin]] merchant called [[Grat]], after it was taken from imprisoned [[Volothamp Geddarm]].
